comment: From the first IBCC group dance to 5th may party a lot time has passed, and we’ve been there for each other all along, you being another me with whom I could think stuff through. As for me it was basically babysitting you (passenger princess), along with swaroop. Keep believing in yourself bhai!
name: Het Sekhalia

comment: Most fun person to be around, learnt a lot from you, for the first time in life met a real fun-nonsense loving person who is not pretending to be that , learnt how to love fun, and have fun. Learnt how to express deepest thought from you and heth. Let's recreate triple threat twerk tower someday 🍑.
name: Padmanabh

comment: From working out on google meets in covid era to being gym bros in college, from recreating epic bollywood scenes to doing bkc in campus we have come a long way. You have been the most fun loving person. Thnx for always getting influenced by me😂.Our billion $ company. is waiting for us.

comment: My black mamba protege.......Hope you esclate to wall street soon from dalal street..... Stop searching those in youtube ffs. OG roommate 😎

comment: The math champ! Love your enthusiasm and excitement...I always wished to match your energy! Always be the same...big things await you. All the best!

comment: Never saw an energetic person like you bro. your energy is just unmatchable. Your positive attitude is something i will be always a fan of. Thank you for being a part of my life.

comment: That person with "rizz" and "charisma", had so much fun with you, starting from the IBCC 2022 to Inter IIT, and in college. Cheers to all the howtodoGym sessions and the how to live carefree motivation. All the best for future✨

comment: My first friend in the college. Goes out of the way to help friends even if he gets screwed big time, thoda selfish ho jaya kr😅. College life would have been incomplete without you bro!
name: Chirag Goel

comment: Bhaiya, you create such a vibe everytime we meet. From spilling tea to gyaan sessions, sab mast tha. Privileged to be ur wingman, jiska kuch kaam nahi Kiya but okay. Khair will miss you and keep in touch!

comment:
Hello bhaiyaa!!
Will miss you spilling college drama stories about yourself mostly..and being an overthinker but still acting all cool...😂
Milne aate rehna bhaiyaa!!🫶💕

comment:

Going to miss you so much bhaiya .
You are one of the most fun loving and cheerful person I have met in dance club.
"Always stay the same 🤍 ."
Best of luck for your future!!

comment: "I am not handsome, mera  Charisma kaafi h" ~ Akshay😂 bhot maze kare bhai sath mai my street battle partner. Sudhar jaa sudhar jaa English ke C. Yeh end nhi h so no concluding words, milte rhenge, trip plan kr jldi se. Life advices dete rehna kabhi kabhi acha bol leta h. All the best bhai.
name: Aryan Gupta

comment: This guy is literally the coolest person in our year and no one can deny that. I will always look back to the fun nights in 207. Arguing with this guy in Telugu is one of the silliest yet best thing. I will always remember this guy for the charm he has in our year and in the whole college tbh

comment: Smart handsome boy with never ending bak bak. Tere bina club me maza nhi tha, start from practice till inter iit. Sabko motivate krta rehta h club me. Thank you for having all the memories that I have with you. All the best for your future
name: Rounak Jain

comment: Dude, 'Dilli wali girlfriend' does and will always remind me of you and ur dance, keep rizzing and sitting with random ppl in mess bcz we all know where it got you 😏😏😂😂

comment: A bundle of joy, lives carefree, simple soul and have some awesome dance moves. Great to know you bro and all the best for your future, jaldi apna hedge fund kholo !!

comment: Fun loving and entertaining person, very energetic and loud! He doesn't hide his emotions and is a great dancer, academically brilliant with a special attachment with mathematics. Wishing you best for future!

comment: May your future be as radiant as the dawn, with endless opportunities lighting up your path and leading you to fulfillment and success. All the very best AKSHAY!!!😃🤞🏼

comment: Love you moves man. Thanks for making our last summer iconic!!

comment:

Be the same ever energetic cheerful person. All the very best for the future Stay in touch !!!

comment: Heyy bhai. Tmarhi chamgad wali kahani kabhi puri sunni hai 😁. All the very best for your future.

comment: Thank you for always being so fun and cool bhaiya! Dance club won't be the same without you. I wish you all the best in your future endeavors!

comment: Most annoying person I have seen who changes his mood instantly 😂.... Never leave ur smile akshay and all the best!!

comment: You guys will always be missed. Wish you all the very best for all your endeavors Akshay.

comment: Most cheerful person and one of the most loving ones I know in the dance club. I love the way you say, “Didi, ek collab karni thi apke saath” or “mujhe  Bharatnatyam steps sikhaye m karunga” everytime you see me! 😂♥️ I miss us dancing together and above all, I miss you! Hopefully, we meet soon! 🫶

comment: Bhaiya, you have the ability to make everyone you meet feel seen and be present in the moment, hoping you never lose that spark! Wishing you good luck!!

comment: My first ever friend at IITI! I remember us quarreling on gmeets. Sorry for those Fiascos. Look at us now, laughing about it! You are an example how we grow in relationships no matter how the start is. Blessed to witness your Dolat moment. Love your passion for maths. Be the sassy cool you. ATB KIT!
